item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel and Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to join our team and handle editing tasks for our YouTube channel and Instagram reels. The ideal candidate should be proficient in video editing software and have experience in creating engaging content for social media platforms. Responsibilities include editing raw footage, adding effects and transitions, trimming clips, and ensuring the videos are aligned with our brand guidelines. The editor should be able to work independently, meet deadlines, and have a strong attention to detail. This is a great opportunity to collaborate with a creative team and contribute to the growth of our online presence.

Skills required:

- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Knowledge of video formats and codecs
- Familiarity with social media platforms and their video requirements
- Strong storytelling and attention to detail
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 15:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Midjourney Expert for TikTok Video Creation (Voiceover & Script Provided) - Upwork
item.description:
Have you used Midjourney? If your answer is NO, please skip this job.


Attention Midjourney Users ONLY:

Are you a skilled Midjourney artist who can translate written scripts and voiceovers into compelling TikTok videos? We have pre-recorded voiceovers and written scripts ready to go – we need your expertise to bring them to life with AI-generated visuals.

Your Task:

Use Midjourney to create eye-catching images that perfectly match the style and message of our provided scripts and voiceovers.
Craft engaging TikTok videos that seamlessly integrate the provided assets.
Requirements:

Proven Midjourney Experience: Must showcase a portfolio of AI-generated images demonstrating your artistic talent and technical skill with Midjourney.
TikTok Video Editing Skills: A portfolio of TikTok videos demonstrating your editing ability, understanding of trends, and knack for creating visually appealing content.
To Apply:

Submit a link to your Midjourney portfolio.
Submit a link to your TikTok portfolio.
Briefly describe your approach to this project and estimated turnaround time.
Note:

This project is exclusively for individuals with demonstrated experience using Midjourney. Applications without a Midjourney portfolio will not be considered.

Let's create TikTok magic together!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 21, 2024 15:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Midjourney AI
Skills: Midjourney AI
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator Youtube (English FLUENT / Spanish / French) - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for 5 top video creators who meet the following criteria. :)

- Voice over + very basic edit
- $2 per video or $2.50 for change thumbnail text and uploading to channel
- Length of video: between 1 and 3 minutes.
- around 15-30 videos per week
- Example channel: https://www.youtube.com/@EasyAsThat
- Share sample video that is similar to example

I'd love to hear examples of work you've done before.

Are you okay with the price from the description? (if not don't apply)
Do you have over 80% job success? (if not don't apply)
Do you have earned more than 50$? (if not don't apply)
You provide a sample and speak fluently with your own voice?  (if not don't apply)

Thanks!

Budget: $150

item.title: Video Editor / Cutter - Upwork
item.description:
My name is Mirhat and I am a passionate adventurer and traveler. I spend a considerable amount of time going on excursions and camping trips with my Jeep Wrangler, during which I document my experiences through quality video footage. I use a Mavic 3 pro, a GoPro, and a Nikon Z8 camera to capture every aspect of my adventures.

I plan on publishing these videos on my newly created YouTube channel, with the intent of sharing my experiences with a broader audience. However, I lack both the time and expertise necessary to effectively and professionally edit these videos.

Hence, I am reaching out in hopes of finding a qualified and passionate video editor who can assist me with the editing and compilation of my videos. I am looking for someone who can transform my footage into appealing, engaging, and visually impressive videos that can captivate and retain the attention of viewers on YouTube.

Ideally, you would have experience editing travel/camping videos and would be capable of seamlessly blending drone, GoPro, and Nikon footage. Familiarity with the requirements and peculiarities of the YouTube format would also be beneficial.

If you are interested and believe you are suitable for this task, I would love to hear from you. Please share your availability, your fees, and examples of your past work.

Thank you in advance for your time and consideration. I look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you to share my travel experiences with the world.

Best Regards,Mirhat

Hourly Range: $20.00-$120.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Color Grading, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.title: Introduction video for new product (slide/sandal) launch - Upwork
item.description:
We are introducing a new product, a slide/sandal, called Xen (pronounced Zen). It is designed to be a very comfortable slide that you can wear all day. On the beach, walking around, or after workouts. We would like an interesting animated video with REALISTIC rendering showing it’s properties.

The 3D files have already been made and are here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/18ozSL2vGqn7DXgen27H_tDVCeweqhMOz?usp=sharing

The 3D renderings of the 2 colorways we are making the slide in are here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1S9vMfm-KQIbgZBkFrKXAWFdTvGg5ADvC?usp=sharing

The packaging box is here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1gXo68BxzOQqOPh2goS_QQus1goi8FeIk?usp=sharing

and I would like to include that in the video too

The specific Pantone colors for each are here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/18RZ3zqfyXpDOy4f_YhczCSHJ9T2IbLx1/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1paf0Y_xR-jQ3noKPkZt9OSItHQ9uMEJq/view?usp=sharing

Here is the 2D design file: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1W9ngY6hWEf3_1eRdsvYlrET02-TsS3MU/view?usp=sharing

I am not very creative, so I would love your ideas on the video. I am only looking for 20-30 seconds at the very most. I don’t need any sound/music for it.

I would like to have something showing an exploded view (I will also need a still image of this for or print ads) of similar that emphasizes certain features of the shoe which are:

-TPEE (which is the material for the insole- the lighter color in each slide) and rubberized EVA (the darker color material in each, combined for shock absorption, energy return and stability
-Flexible carbon fiber X-plate (the piece below) keeps the sandal in contact with your foot, so there is no “snapping” when walking and it feels like more of an extension of your foot.
-Strategically placed vents for air flow and long term break in
-Convex dorsal strap in the toe box for more air flow and toe separation to help prevent athletes foot and plantar fasciatis
-Generous footbed with long, gentle flowing arch
-Footprint like outsole tread pattern for confident grip
-Designed by a board certified podiatrist

Again, I am open to any ideas, but it is important to also emphasize that these are EXTREMELY comfortable and supportive.

We need the output in a format suitable for Youtube, Facebook and Instagram.

Thanks. Please let me know if you have any questions at all.

Noah

Please see the attached file for images of the specific key points and please ask any questions.

Please respond with some ideas on your proposal on what scenes the video might have.

Any examples of previous work either with shoes or any project would be appreciated and helpful to get an idea of your vision for this.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:50 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:3D Animation, Maxon Cinema 4D, Houdini, Blender, Autodesk 3ds Max, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics
Skills: 3D Animation, Maxon Cinema 4D, Houdini, Blender, Autodesk 3ds Max, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 🚀 Join Our Team as a Part-Time Creative Director and Revolutionise Advertising at Click Hive Ltd! - Upwork
item.description:
Company: Click Hive Ltd
Location: Remote
Reports To: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)

About Us:
Click Hive Ltd is on a mission to redefine advertising! We craft compelling ad content that drives engagement and results. Specialising in user-generated content (UGC) and graphic ads, we're all about delivering top-notch creative solutions that wow our clients and their audiences.

Why This Role Rocks:
Are you a creative genius with a knack for graphic design and video editing? Do you thrive on leading talented teams to create jaw-dropping ads? If so, we want YOU to join our team as a part-time Creative Director! This is your chance to shape the future of advertising with a company that values innovation and creativity.

**Creative directors mostly generate briefs for ads and come up with the ideas/search trends.**

Key Responsibilities:

Creative Leadership:
Inspire and direct our creative team to new heights.
Review and refine creative work to perfection.
Pitch ground-breaking ideas that captivate our clients.
Roll up your sleeves and dive into projects when needed.

Team Management:
Lead a team of graphic designers, video editors, and copywriters.
Provide feedback and foster a culture of continuous improvement.
Spark creativity through dynamic brainstorming sessions.

Project Oversight:
Manage creative tasks in Trello with precision.
Ensure timely delivery and top-notch quality of all creative assets.
Collaborate with the UGC Manager and Graphic Designer to hit client targets.

Client Interaction:
Present your visionary concepts in monthly client meetings.
Keep the communication flowing to understand client needs.
Deliver creative solutions that align with client goals and brand ethos.

Reporting and Analysis:
Track and report on creative team performance.
Analyse feedback and campaign results to fine-tune strategies.

Skills and Qualifications:

Must-Have:
Proven experience in social media advertising.
Mastery in graphic design and video editing.
Exceptional leadership and team management skills.
Stellar communication and presentation abilities.
Expertise in Canva and Adobe Creative Suite, Foreplay, Motion, trends, PipiAds, TikTok and Meta ads libraries
Proficiency with Trello or similar project management tools.
Strong organisational skills and a keen eye for detail.

Bonus Points:
eCommerce experience is a massive plus!

What We Offer:
Flexible (depending on current workload), part-time hourly contract role with competitive pay.
Opportunities for performance-based bonuses.
A dynamic and remote work environment.
The chance to lead a creative revolution in advertising!
How to Apply:
Ready to make your mark in the world of advertising? Send your application, portfolio, and tell us why you're the perfect fit for this role.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:39 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Facebook Advertising, Social Media Advertising, Product Listing Ad, Video Advertising, Native Advertising, Mobile Advertising, Facebook, Instagram
Skills: Facebook Advertising, Social Media Advertising, Product Listing Ad, Video Advertising, Native Advertising, Mobile Advertising, Facebook, Instagram
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing - Explainer Video Change - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to make changes to our existing explainer video. The video needs minor adjustments to the text, graphics, and voice over. The changes required are small and should not take much time for an experienced editor. The final video should be engaging, visually appealing, and match our brand identity. This project is perfect for someone who has experience in video editing and can deliver high-quality work within a short timeframe.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Graphics design
    - Text animation
    - Background music selection

    If you are passionate about video editing and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to work with you!

    Please include your portfolio or samples of previous video editing work for review.

    Note: The original video will be provided, and the changes required will be specified in detail.

    We look forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $50

item.title: Video Editor Needed for Casino Review YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced video editor to join our team and help create engaging content for our YouTube channel.

Our channel focuses on reviewing online casinos, providing highlights from our streams, and creating popular video formats like ranking lists.

If you have a keen eye for detail, a creative mindset, and experience in video editing for YouTube, we’d love to hear from you!

Responsibilities:

• Edit and produce high-quality videos from our stream highlights and raw footage.
• Create engaging content for our YouTube channel, including but not limited to review videos, ranking lists, and other popular video formats.
• Add graphics, animations, and other visual elements to enhance the video content.
• Ensure the final product is polished, professional, and aligned with our brand.
• Collaborate with our team to understand the vision and requirements for each video.
• Meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Requirements:
• Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with a focus on YouTube content.
• Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
• Strong understanding of YouTube trends, video formats, and audience engagement techniques.
• Ability to add creative elements such as graphics, animations, and sound effects.
• Excellent attention to detail and a strong sense of timing and pacing.
• Good communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a team.
• A portfolio showcasing previous video editing work, particularly for YouTube channels.

Please submit your application with the following:

A brief introduction about yourself and your experience in video editing.
Links to your portfolio or examples of previous work, especially YouTube videos.
A short description of your editing process and the software you use.
Add in "I'm your guy/girl". Applications that do not include this will not be eligible for the next steps.

We look forward to finding a creative and dedicated video editor to help us take our YouTube channel to the next level!

Budget: $125
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Final Cut Pro, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Final Cut Pro, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Amazon Graphic Designer and/or Video Creator in Guangzhou, China - Upwork
item.description:
In this role, you will be responsible for creating high-quality visual content specifically for Amazon product listings and marketing materials. You will work closely with account managers, product managers, and copywriters to ensure brand consistency and optimal product presentation.

Responsibilities

Design eye-catching product listing visuals (main image, secondary images, A+ content) that comply with Amazon guidelines and best practices.
Develop creative concepts for marketing materials such as display ads, social media graphics, and promotional flyers targeted towards Amazon sellers.
Maintain brand consistency across all Amazon related visuals.
Conduct research on competitor listings and current design trends on Amazon.
Stay up-to-date on the latest Amazon advertising specifications and design best practices.
Collaborate effectively with internal teams (account managers, product managers, copywriters) to ensure clear communication and project deadlines are met.

Qualifications

Minimum 3 years of experience as a graphic designer, with a focus on e-commerce or marketing materials.
Proven experience creating high-quality visuals for online platforms.
Strong understanding of design principles and best practices.
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
Working knowledge of Amazon Seller Central and advertising platforms (optional, but a plus).
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Experience working in a fast-paced environment.
A creative and results-oriented mind with a passion for e-commerce.
Fluency in Mandarin Chinese and English. Other languages are a bonus.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:33 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Illustration
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Illustration
Country: ESP
click to apply

item.title: Content Marketer - Upwork
item.description:
About Us

Filmatic AI is a tech startup that develops AI tools for editing in the filmmaking industry and for content creators. Our core product can match color between any two cameras. We have additional products in the roadmap that aim to enhance the quality of footage from digital video cameras. We are a small, nimble team open to new strategies and execute quickly on asset development, as our team is comprised of cinematographers.

Qualifications

Demonstrated track record of success in turning content into traffic, engaging and educating audiences, and creating content that converts prospects into customers
Familiarity with best practices for SEO and experience writing for and/or managing social media channels
Entrepreneurial-minded, with a high sense of urgency, dedication, and drive to succeed
Responsibilities

This position requires a combination of content creation, creativity, strategy, and analytical skills to define and optimize content engagement across channels (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Email, etc.)
You will define our content calendar and collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop content strategies and executions

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:33 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Content Writing, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Content Marketing, Marketing
Skills: Content Writing, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Content Marketing, Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video Content Creator (Must Show Face on Camera) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a UGC creator who will record themselves reviewing an AI Software. The script will be provided. The video will be MAX 60 seconds long. There is NO editing required.

How it will work:
1) Please apply to this upwork job if you think you are a good fit
2) If chosen, we will send you an upwork contract to accept + the script
3) You will record yourself
4) You'll send us the raw video files once you are done filming

Very important: Aside from just recording yourself acting out the script, we will also need a few simple b-roll shots of you at your computer pretending you are using the software.

Budget: $65

item.title: Videographer and Editor Needed in Las Vegas for Non-Profit - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer in Las Vegas to film interviews with our non-profit client in the next couple of. The ideal candidate will have experience in capturing high-quality footage and audio. After filming, you will be responsible for editing the video together with other elements captured from previous events. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are crucial in this role.   

Script is already approved and ready to film.

Skills required:
- Videography
- Video editing
- Attention to detail
- Ability to meet deadlines
- Capable of being client-facing and handling asking interview questions.

We are aiming to have the video completed and uploaded for a July 19th website launch. If you do not edit, please let us know as we have other editors available but would prefer a single team to work with. Looking to have a vendor determined next week (June 24-28), filming the following week or next (July 1- 12), should only be one day of filming. There may be a location scout needed beforehand to find a viable location for the interviews. Editing and finalizing the video the next week (July 15-19).

Dates can have some flexibility but we're trying to stay within this schedule if at all possible. Video will also have some windows where we'll be waiting for client approvals so that may cause adjustments to schedule.

Thanks so much!

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:22 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Camera
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Camera
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
``Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency ```Requirements:```
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Familiarity with other editing software like Adobe Bridge, Capture One, and Maya is a plus
- Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00

item.title: Video editor needed for TikTok/YouTube short videos of people appealing for help in Gaza - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Everyone

GetMoreDonations is a performance based agency based in Boca Raton Florida that specializes in helping out non profit organizations with fundraising for charities. Our goal is to help as many people as possible that are in dire need of our help.

Just to give you an idea, we have helped tens of thousands of families in places such as Yemen, Syria, and even assisted the homeless in NYC.

We are looking for a solid video editor that can help us make emotional stories by editing found-footage and news clips.

Here is an example of a video we found:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OSdddzjkzpM

This is how the video should be edited after (Here is an example of how we edited it):

https://youtu.be/ceRU9EMknsU

Basically when you edit these videos they need to show the most emotional part of the refugees story and then get people to donate as quickly as possible.

You must have experience editing videos. Facebook and Youtube ads experience a big plus. You must be competent and able to retell emotional stories by editing found-footage and news clips. You must speak good/fluent english for proper communication, know terms such as "L Cut" , and be able to complete projects within specified deadlines.  When applying please send examples of what videos you have edited in the past.

If you meet our requirements, then this will be for a full time, long term position.  With your help, we can help expand our goal to help 1,000,000 people in less than a year.

To learn more about us, please visit getmoredonations.com

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a GERMAN Translator! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

PLEASE ONLY APPLY IF YOU ARE FLUENT IN ENGLISH & GERMAN LANGUAGES.

We need someone that can copy-paste translate our YouTube scripts + translate the titles to 3 of our YouTube channels for each video, and generate new audio files with Elevenlabs!

We need someone that has a basic to advance skill in video editing.

You need to make sure that the titles sounds good and native in the languages you translate to so they can perform well! The translated audio files also need to sound good so people in other languages can enjoy them 🙌

We are using YouTubes new feature and want to expand to multiple languages to get bigger reach

There will be about 15-20 titles & scripts per week that needs to be translated into all of these 4 languages

You will be using Google translate or ChatGPT for translation and
Elevenlabs to generate the audio files, we also need you to cut up the files so they match the video length!

IMPORTANT:
It's great if you can use audio or editing programs to adjust the length of the generations of AI text to speech. It needs to match the length of the videos on YouTube to be compatible!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:14 UTC
Category: Manual Transcription
Skills:English, German, Translation, Video Editing
Skills: English, German, Translation, Video Editing
Country: Sweden
click to apply
